Description: Nanostring is partnering with you to transform your approach to cancer research to gain a greater understanding of the complex landscape of cancer. Nanostring's suite of translational solutions empowers you to get actionable insights faster, from single cells to multi-cellular compartments. Learn how ultra-high-plex, single-cell, spatial biology helps identify novel potentially therapeutic ligand-receptor pairs. Reveal the tumor heterogeneity in the microenvironment to aid in uncovering potential mechanisms of action and response to therapy. Or confidently discover biomarkers and translate them to signatures with scalable multi-cohort studies. Stay a step ahead of cancer with Nanostring integrated research tools.
SearchResultBody: ESP04B. Partnering with Cancer Researchers for 20 years and Counting
Title: Partnering with Cancer Researchers for 20 years and Counting
